0.text: Innate: Fizz gains  ghosting and takes 4 (+ 1% AP) reduced damage from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

markedPassages: ghosting

0.text: Active: Fizz  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy. If they are in range upon arrival, he deals magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Fizz dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy. If they are in range upon arrival, he deals magic damage plus 100% AD physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

on-hit

0.text: Passive: Fizz's basic attacks rend enemies  on-hit, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.

1.text: Active: Fizz empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus magic damage.
1.html: Active: Fizz empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
50 bonus range

2.text: If Seastone Trident kills its target, the  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and Fizz restores  mana. Otherwise, if the target is not killed, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage  on-hit for the next 5 seconds.
2.html: If Seastone Trident kills its target, the  cooldown is reduced to 1 second and Fizz restores  mana. Otherwise, if the target is not killed, Fizz's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit for the next 5 seconds.

mana
on-hit

untargetable

1.text: He then begins to hop off of his trident over 0.5 seconds, afterwards becoming targetable and landing to create a splash that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them for 2 seconds.
1.html: He then begins to hop off of his trident over 0.5 seconds, afterwards becoming targetable and landing to create a splash that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

2.text: While hopping off of the trident, Fizz may input movement commands to direct his landing. Playful will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

possibleConcerningAbilities: While hopping off of the trident, Fizz may input movement commands to direct his landing. Playful will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Fizz throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting  sight of the area before it emerges to chomp at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing Chum the Waters'  damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.
0.html: Active: Fizz throws down a lure at the target location that attracts a shark, granting sight of the area before it emerges to chomp at the lure after 2 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, though not through terrain, and slowing them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted; increasing Chum the Waters' damage, slow, eruption radius and knock back distance.
markedPassages: sight
knocking them back
slowing

1.text: Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.
1.html: Guppy (<455): 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knock back distance.

2.text: Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.
2.html: Chomper (455-910): 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knock back distance.

3.text: Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.
3.html: Gigalodon (>910): 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knock back distance.

4.text: Enemy  champions can intercept the lure while it is in flight, which attaches to them upon contact and causes the shark to emerge at their position after the same delay. The lure's holder is  slowed and  revealed for the duration and afterwards is impacted by the eruption but is  knocked up for 1 second instead of knocked back.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
